title: DLSA Sonitpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Para Legal Volunteer Post
description: District Legal Services Authority (DLSA) Sonitpur has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Para Legal Volunteers Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the DLSA Sonitpur Recruitment 2025 . For more information, Like age limit, selection process, salary structure, educational details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
